blogPost.excerpt: For too long, early stage startups have been a walled garden, so we decided to build a door. 🚪 (1) Over text message, tell us what you're looking for (2) We'll monitor for matching jobs (3) We'll connect you with the founding team when there's a match
blogPost.body: For too long, early stage startups have been a walled garden, so we decided to build a door. 🚪 (1) Over text message, tell us what you're looking for (2) We'll monitor for matching jobs (3) We'll connect you with the founding team when there's a match
blogPost.title: Pearl - An SMS hiring network for the startup world
blogPost.author: Tim Connors

localize.description: 太久以来，早期创业公司一直是一座有围墙的花园，所以我们决定建一扇门。🚪(1)通过短信告诉我们您在寻找什么(2)我们将监控是否有匹配的工作(3)当有匹配的工作时，我们会为您接通创始团队
localize.tagline: 面向初创企业的短信招聘网络

localize.description: 太久以來，早期創業公司一直是一座有圍牆的花園，所以我們決定建一扇門。🚪(1)通過短信告訴我們您在尋找什麼(2)我們將監控是否有匹配的工作(3)當有匹配的工作時，我們會爲您接通創始團隊
localize.tagline: 面向初創企業的短信招聘網絡

previous.excerpt: Preparing for sales meetings is hard and tiresome. 1Page helps you search less, and sell more, by delivering customized one-page summary for every meeting and call, minutes before every meeting!
previous.title: 1Page - 1 Page summary to help you to join every meeting confidently

localize.description: 为销售会议做准备是很辛苦的，也是很累人的。1Page通过在每次会议前几分钟，为每次会议和电话提供定制的单页摘要，帮助您减少搜索，增加销售量。
localize.tagline: 1页总结，助你自信加入每一次会议

localize.description: 爲銷售會議做準備是很辛苦的，也是很累人的。1Page通過在每次會議前幾分鐘，爲每次會議和電話提供定製的單頁摘要，幫助您減少搜索，增加銷售量。
localize.tagline: 1頁總結，助你自信加入每一次會議
